item.description:
Come hang out at the Incredible Pulp in Narragansett and play some Standard MtG!

Entry Fee: $6.00
Prizes: 1.5 booster packs will be added into the prize pool for each player.
1st place gets 40% of the prize pool
2nd place get 30% of the prize pool
3rd and 4th place each get 15% of the prize pool.

Bring your own 60 card deck (+ 15 card sideboard) to compete. Make sure all your cards are Standard legal!

Also, 4 players will get a promotional Acidic Slime card: the top 2 players in the event and two randomly selected players!

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Friday Night Magic at the Incredible Pulp - Standard Deck
